description: Dashboard for Micrometer(Java, Spring Boot, Actuator)

alert.name: Dubbo Request Success Rate is Low

targets.expr: sum by (pod_name, uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="trading-engine", status!~"5.."}[2m]))/sum by (pod_name, uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="trading-engine", status!~"5.."}[2m]))

title: trading-engine
